reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that Codeway may process personal data specified in the policy.
reply.reference: Codeway may process your personal data for the purposes specified in this Privacy Policy. The personal data of users collected and used by Codeway include your name, surname, e-mail address, phone number, order information, age group, and other personal data obtained during app usage. URL: https://static.iqmasters.app/privacy-en.html

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal data such as name, surname, email address, phone number, order information, age group, gender, survey responses, In-app purchase history, Internet Protocol Address (IP Address), Identifier for Advertisers (IDFA), and Identifier for Vendors/Developers (IDVF).

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly outlines the specific types of personal data collected by the app, ranging from basic contact details to more targeted information such as survey responses and identifiers for advertising purposes.
reply.reference: Name and surname, e-mail address, phone number, order information, age group and gender, information, survey responses, answers, choices or other data that you provide through use of IQ Masters application, your scores and performances in the games, Identifier for Advertisers (IDFA), Identifier for Vendors/Developers (IDVF), and Internet Protocol Address-IP Address. URL: https://static.iqmasters.app/privacy-en.html.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the app describes the data collected, how it is used, stored, protected, and shared. It specifies various purposes for processing personal data, such as marketing analysis, creating user accounts, informing about new products, and fulfilling legal obligations.
reply.reference: This Privacy Policy describes which data we collect, how we intend to use, store, protect and share the data we collect, how you can withdraw your consent for the processing of these data and how you can correct and revise the data. Capitalized terms in this Policy shall have the meanings specified in the Terms and Conditions unless defined separately in this Policy. URL: https://static.iqmasters.app/privacy-en.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Users can opt out of data collection or request deletion of their data by submitting a request through the “Data Subject Application Form” at support@codeway.co.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the process for users to opt out of data collection or request deletion of their data.
reply.reference: You can opt out of our collection and processing of such data, you can submit a request to support@codeway.co. If you choose to opt out, please note that our services will not be customized. URL: https://static.iqmasters.app/privacy-en.html

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that personal data may be transferred to service providers and third parties such as Facebook SDK, Adjust, and Firebase Analytics for various purposes.
reply.reference: Codeway may also transfer your personal data to service providers of our Company, third parties such as Facebook SDK, Adjust and Firebase Analytics which are embedded into our service for the following purposes: － Sharing identity, communication and transaction security information with authorized public institutions and organizations for the purpose of execution of activities in compliance with legislation, monitor and execution of legal affairs, informing authorized persons, institutions, and organizations. － Sharing identity and contact information to manage after-sales support services, conduct business activities and manage customer relationship management processes. URL: https://static.iqmasters.app/privacy-en.html
